ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local.DBHelper

  • public class DBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Purpose: Creates and sets up the database to be used using the information about the database provided in the contract class (DbHelper). Also keeps the tables updated.
    Design Pattern: Singleton, so there is ever only one instance of this class.
    Author:
    Ashley Brown, Stephanie Gil

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DBHelper getInstance(Context context)
      Gets a new instance of DbHelper.

      Sets up the tables.
      void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db, int oldVersion, int newVersion)

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DBHelper getInstance(Context context)
        Gets a new instance of DbHelper. If one already exists, returns that one. I.e. DbHelper is a singleton.

        CODE REUSE:
        The following code was modified from:
        URL: http://www.androiddesignpatterns.com/2012/05/correctly-managing-your-sqlite-database.html
        When: September 17, 2013
        Author: ALEX LOCKWOOD
        License: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        DbHelper

        Sets up the tables.

      • onUpgrade

             int oldVersion,
             int newVersion)
        Deletes the tables and recreates them for an update.
